backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with admin authorization, contact message storage, and user profile management using AccessControl and stable admin restoration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a requirement to replace a static resume PDF with an uploaded user PDF.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of multiple frontend components and hooks for reference.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and base styles defining light/dark color tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file with cache-busting headers and root mount for the React app.
frontend/scripts/generateCaffeineAdminTo: Node script generating secure admin tokens for provisioning Messages admin access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling client-side routing between portfolio sections and the Messages page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with themed styling and caffeine.ai attribution.
Responsive navbar with smooth scrolling, mobile menu, and Internet Identity authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Reusable section wrapper providing consistent spacing, titles, and layout structure.
frontend/src/config/adminToken.ts: Provides the admin token from env or a hardcoded fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reloading when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithAdminProv: Creates a backend actor and performs one-time admin provisioning using a URL token, with auto‑reprovisioning.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current caller is recognized as admin via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmit.ts: Provides a submit function for contact messages using the actor and normalizes submission errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Animates a count-up when an element becomes visible, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches all contact messages when admin access is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theming variables, and custom utilities for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Admin‑only messages page handling admin provisioning, remediation, and message display.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders an About section with professional summary, education details, and career vision using cards and icons.
frontend/src/sections/CertificationsSect: Displays a certifications section with a single card highlighting a Data Science with Generative AI certification.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, error handling, and submission via a custom hook, along with static contact details.
Shows a timeline-style professional experience list with roles, periods, and achievements rendered in cards.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Builds a visually rich hero section with metrics, skill highlights, smooth scrolling, and resume download logic.
frontend/src/sections/ProjectsSection.ts: Lists featured analytics projects with descriptions, highlights, tools, and icons in card layouts.
frontend/src/sections/SkillsSection.tsx: Presents categorized technical skills using cards, icons, and badges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current redesign goals, architectural guidelines, known issues, and feature tracking information for the portfolio site.
